data.title: Craig Conway (actor) ~ Complete Biography with [ Photos
data.meta_description: Craig Conway (born 1975) is an English actor. Conway has appeared in a number of stage plays and television series in addition to his film work. Conway was the husband of actress Jill Halfpenny, with whom he has a son. Our Friends in the North (1996) TV miniseries  Christopher Collins (child) Down
data.text:
Nisha Rathode

(Editor)

I love writing and learning new things in order to better educate those in need. I also enjoy hackathons and adventures around the world.

Craig Conway (born 1975) is an English actor. Conway has appeared in a number of stage plays and television series in addition to his film work.
